snippet: No. 3 Louisville outscored College of Charleston by 19 points over the final 6 minutes 41 seconds Saturday to pull away to a 70-48 victory.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Louisville beats Charleston, 70-48; other college men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: No. 3 Louisville outscored College of Charleston by 19 points over the final 6 minutes 41 seconds Saturday to pull away to a 70-48 victory.

headline.main: Louisville and UConn Open Title Defenses With Routs
headline.print_headline: Louisville and UConn Open Title Defenses With Routs
